attributes.action: avoid conferring any honour upon us in his Resignation Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events have undermined faith in the Honours system and our appearance in a Resignation Honours List personally compiled by the Prime Minister would be a source of embarassment. It might also attract the attention of the police and the tax authorities.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
